Stock Metrics
About

Welcome to Stock Metrics! Please enter any valid(!) stock ticker into the search bar, and see the price chart compared to a benchmark! We start with a 3 month price chart compared to the S&P500 Index ETF, but you may select other time frames and benchmarks.

To mark the times (Feb 2021), we have loaded Gamestop as the default stock to chart. Diamond Hands!

Our benchmarks used are SPY: SPDR S&P 500 ETF Trust , VTI: Vanguard Total Stock Market Index Fund ETF Shares , and VWO: Vanguard FTSE Emerging Markets Index Fund ETF Shares
